lead_paragraph: A picture caption last Sunday with an article in some editions about the big expectations facing the Tampa Bay Rays heading into this season carried an incorrect identification from Getty Images of the player shown batting against the Rays during the 2008 World Series. He is Ryan Howard of the Philadelphia Phillies — not his former teammate Pat Burrell, who signed with the Rays in the off-season.
